name: Looks like I spoke too soon. Micro.blog handles photo posts with titles now, but seems to not embed if you include any content in the body, which Known let's me do.

content.html: Looks like I spoke too soon. Micro.blog handles photo posts with titles now, but seems to not embed if you include any content in the body, which Known let's me do.
content.value: Looks like I spoke too soon. Micro.blog handles photo posts with titles now, but seems to not embed if you include any content in the body, which Known let's me do.

summary: @cleverdevil That's right. Currently the photo has to be the only thing in the body of the post if a title is used.

content.html: @cleverdevil That's right. Currently the photo has to be the only thing in the body of the post if a title is used.
